articles.author: Mariella Moon
articles.title: Ubisoft has suspended advertising on Elon Musk's X - Engadget
articles.description: Ubisoft is the latest company to join what seems to be a growing list of advertisers pulling their campaigns from Elon Musk's X, formerly known as Twitter.
articles.content: Ubisoft is the latest company to join what seems to be a growing list of advertisers pulling their campaigns from Elon Musk's X, formerly known as Twitter. The company has confirmed to PCGamer and Ax… [+1838 chars]
